channel.title: 0087adam's new help thread!
channel.description:
~O~ Chapter 1 ~O~ 1. adding the ::god command 2. how to make someone a mod or admin 3. how to change your servers port 4. TTKScape V2.2 Compiler
PS: a REP+ would come in handy :)
SUBJECT #1
open client.java
type ctrl-f
paste this in the text box [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase[/code]
go exactly one line above it, at the end of the string press enter
the paste this there: [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } //command installed under 0087adam's help thread. [/code]
Save. Compile. Run.
btw, where it says [code]playerRights >= 1[/code] tats for mods and admins [code]playerRights >= 0[/code] Everyone [code]playerRights >= 2[/code] thats for admins only
change that to them for the specified results
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Subject #2
open up characters open up the desired characters file
something likr this should appear
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = username character-password = password
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3254 character-posy = 3434 character-rights = 2 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070713 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 5778
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 1163 0 character-equip = 1 6568 0 character-equip = 2 6585 0 character-equip = 3 4151 0 character-equip = 4 1127 0 character-equip = 5 1187 0 character-equip = 6 -1 0 character-equip = 7 1079 0 character-equip = 8 -1 0 character-equip = 9 7462 0 character-equip = 10 3105 0 character-equip = 11 -1 0 character-equip = 12 6735 0 character-equip = 13 -1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 7 character-look = 2 8 character-look = 3 9 character-look = 4 5 character-look = 5 0
[SKILLS] NFS
[ITEMS]
[BANK]
[FRIENDS]
[IGNORES]
[EOF]
[/code]
Ok find
[code] PlayerRights = 0 [/code]
change that to
Mod: [code] PlayerRights = 1 [/code] Admins: [code] PlayerRights = 2 [/code]
there you should have it
i don't really know what 3 is yet
save. go back.
next go to Data
click on either administrators or Moderators depending on wat u made the player
then add his name
Save. Compile. Run.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SUBJECT #3
open server.java
type ctrl-f
paste this in the text box: [code]public static int serverlistenerPort = [/code]
then you chould see
[code] public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594 //43593 = Default[/code]
change the first 43594 to your port!
Save. Compile. Run.
Dont forget to Port Forward! XD
------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SUBJECT #4
Left-Click on Compile.bat Click Edit Delete Everything then paste this:
[Code] //All of the following code is (c) 2007 The Temple Knights http://www.freewebs.com/0087adam all rights reserved
@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pr=%programfiles%\Java\ :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title TTKScape v2.24 Compiler echo Welcome to the TTKScape v2.2 Compiler to get started echo Please choose an option below. echo. echo c - Compile yo scape. echo r - To Run yo scape. echo e - To exit out of TTKscape V2.2 Compiler. echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive file. echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this TTKscape V2.2 Compiler. echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==jar goto jar if %c%==Jar goto jar if %c%==JAR goto jar if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :jar title .Jar Archive Creator cls echo What will be the name of the Jar Archive File?? echo. set /p name=Name: if exist *.class (del *.class) set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\javac.exe set go=jar2 goto cj :jar2 %java% -cp . *java echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest echo Main-Class: server >> manifest set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\jar.exe set go=jar3 goto cj :jar3 if not exist *.class (goto jre) %java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class del runserver.bat del manifest del *.class goto jl :jar4 set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0 set jav=bin\java.exe set go=jar5 goto cj :jar5 echo @echo off >> runserver.bat echo title %name% >> runserver.bat echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat echo pause >> runserver.bat cls echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning echo the Jar file, In the mean time, please visit the site at: echo http://www.freewebs.com/0087adam pause goto menu set :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0 set jav=bin\javac.exe set go=c2 goto cj :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %java% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause cls goto menu :c5 %java% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You must have .java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0 set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0 set jav=bin\java.exe set go=r2 goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. echo please be sure you create a backup file of all your echo server files before you EVEN THINK ABOUT running yours pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are Valid. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cj if exist "%pro2%_01\%jav%" (goto sj) if exist "%pro2%\%jav%" (goto sj2) if exist "%pro%_10\%jav%" (goto sj3) if exist "%pro%_09\%jav%" (goto sj4) if exist "%pro%_08\%jav%" (goto sj5) if exist "%pro%_07\%jav%" (goto sj6) if exist "%pro%_06\%jav%" (goto sj7) if exist "%pro%_05\%jav%" (goto sj8) if exist "%pro%_04\%jav%" (goto sj9) if exist "%pro%_03\%jav%" (goto sj10) if exist "%pro%_02\%jav%" (goto sj11) if exist "%pro%_01\%jav%" (goto sj12) if exist "%pro%\%jav%" (goto sj13) else (goto je) :sj set java="%pro2%_01\%jav%" goto %go% :sj2 set java="%pro2%\%jav%" goto %go% :sj3 set java="%pro%_10\%jav%" goto %go% :sj4 set java="%pro%_09\%jav%" goto %go% :sj5 set java="%pro%_08\%jav%" goto %go% :sj6 set java="%pro%_07\%jav%" goto %go% :sj7 set java="%pro%_06\%jav%" goto %go% :sj8 set java="%pro%_05\%jav%" goto %go% :sj9 set java="%pro%_04\%jav%" goto %go% :sj10 set java="%pro%_03\%jav%" goto %go% :sj11 set java="%pro%_02\%jav%" goto %go% :sj12 set java="%pro%_01\%jav%" goto %go% :sj13 set java="%pro%\%jav%" goto %go% :je cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. echo please go to the java website and download it pause cls goto menu :sl cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler v1>> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :sl2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r6 :cl cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using TTkScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c5 :cl2 cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1 >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c4 :jl cls echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto jar4 :reset cls echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs... pause del "Compile Logs.txt" goto menu [/code]
Save. Exit. Compile. run.

item.title: 0087adam's new help thread!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Your Java Skills

[quote=“world-pk-scape, post:11, topic:133069”][quote author=0087adam link=topic=184353.msg1671144#msg1671144 date=1187003532]
THE OLD ONE GOT FUCKING FLAMED, YOU FLAME THIS ONE, I’LL RIP OFF UR HEAD AND SHIT DOWN UR NECK!
[/quote]

playerRights >= 1tats for mods and admins
^noob 1 right is for mod^[/quote]

FAIL. He is right. “>= 1” means HIGHER or EQUAL to 1. 2 is higher than 1, therefore it includes admins.

[quote=“world-pk-scape, post:11, topic:133069”]Code:
playerRights >= 0Everyone
^true^[/quote]

FAIL #2. Once again, learn basic maths. HIGHER or EQUAL to 0. Means EVERYONE! playerRights 0, 1, 2, 3, 500, whatever. As long as their playerRights are above 0, it includes them.

[quote=“world-pk-scape, post:11, topic:133069”]Code:
playerRights >= 2thats for admins only
^true^[/quote]

Not so much or a failure. “>= 2” would be admins (2) AND owners (3), aswell as anyone above that.

Overall Result:

EPIC FAILURE

Recommended Direction:

Tape a knife to a wall, pointy end sticking out, and run into it.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2007, 02:49:43 AM[/size][hr][quote=“world-pk-scape, post:13, topic:133069”][quote author=0087adam link=topic=184353.msg1671144#msg1671144 date=1187003532]
THE OLD ONE GOT FUCKING FLAMED, [/quote]

i can see y, ur bloody hopeless at coding[/quote]

HE is hopeless? Jesus, a good programmer to you must be god.

Read full topic

item.title: 0087adam's new help thread!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“0087adam, post:1, topic:133069”]SUBJECT #4

Left-Click on Compile.bat
Click Edit
Delete Everything then paste this:

//All of the following code is (c) 2007 The Temple Knights http://www.freewebs.com/0087adam all rights reserved

@echo off
if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pr=%programfiles%\Java\
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title TTKScape v2.24 Compiler
echo Welcome to the TTKScape v2.2 Compiler to get started
echo Please choose an option below.
echo.
echo c - Compile yo scape.
echo r - To Run yo scape.
echo e - To exit out of TTKscape V2.2 Compiler.
echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive file.
echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this TTKscape V2.2 Compiler.
echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option: 
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==jar goto jar
if %c%==Jar goto jar
if %c%==JAR goto jar
if %c%==color goto color
if %c%==Color goto color
if %c%==COLOR goto color
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:jar
title .Jar Archive Creator
cls
echo What will be the name of the Jar Archive File??
echo.
set /p name=Name: 
if exist *.class (del *.class)
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=jar2
goto cj
:jar2
%java% -cp . *java
echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest
echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest
echo Main-Class: server >> manifest
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\jar.exe
set go=jar3
goto cj
:jar3
if not exist *.class (goto jre)
%java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class
del runserver.bat
del manifest
del *.class
goto jl
:jar4
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=jar5
goto cj
:jar5
echo @echo off  >> runserver.bat
echo title %name% >> runserver.bat
echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat
echo pause >> runserver.bat
cls
echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will
echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning
echo the Jar file, In the mean time, please visit the site at:
echo http://www.freewebs.com/0087adam
pause
goto menu
set 
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option: 
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Compiler
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=c2
goto cj
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%java% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%java% -cp . .\src\*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
move .\src\*.class .\classes\
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You must have .java files for this Compiler to Compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=r2
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
echo please be sure you create a backup file of all your 
echo server files before you EVEN THINK ABOUT running yours
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are Valid.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cj
if exist "%pro2%_01\%jav%" (goto sj)
if exist "%pro2%\%jav%" (goto sj2)
if exist "%pro%_10\%jav%" (goto sj3)
if exist "%pro%_09\%jav%" (goto sj4)
if exist "%pro%_08\%jav%" (goto sj5)
if exist "%pro%_07\%jav%" (goto sj6)
if exist "%pro%_06\%jav%" (goto sj7)
if exist "%pro%_05\%jav%" (goto sj8)
if exist "%pro%_04\%jav%" (goto sj9)
if exist "%pro%_03\%jav%" (goto sj10)
if exist "%pro%_02\%jav%" (goto sj11)
if exist "%pro%_01\%jav%" (goto sj12)
if exist "%pro%\%jav%" (goto sj13) else (goto je)
:sj
set java="%pro2%_01\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj2
set java="%pro2%\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj3
set java="%pro%_10\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj4
set java="%pro%_09\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj5
set java="%pro%_08\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj6
set java="%pro%_07\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj7
set java="%pro%_06\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj8
set java="%pro%_05\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj9
set java="%pro%_04\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj10
set java="%pro%_03\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj11
set java="%pro%_02\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj12
set java="%pro%_01\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj13
set java="%pro%\%jav%"
goto %go%
:je
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.
echo please go to the java website and download it
pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler v1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto r5
:sl2
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto r6
:cl
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTkScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto c5
:cl2
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1 >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto c4
:jl
cls
echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto jar4
:reset
cls
echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs...
pause
del "Compile Logs.txt"
goto menu

Save.
Exit.
Compile.
run.[/quote]

Compiler you say?

@echo off javac *.java pause

Shit I’m leet. Hmmm you want a runner aswell? Here you go:

@echo off java server pause

Man, I’m so awesome. How about a combo deal.

@echo off javac *.java java server pause

WIN

Read full topic

item.title: 0087adam's new help thread!
item.dc:creator: @0087adam 0087adam
item.description:
@0087adam wrote:

~O~ Chapter 1 ~O~

  1. adding the ::god command
  2. how to make someone a mod or admin
  3. how to change your servers port
  4. TTKScape V2.2 Compiler

PS: a REP+ would come in handy

SUBJECT #1

open client.java

type ctrl-f

paste this in the text box

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

go exactly one line above it, at the end of the string press enter

the paste this there:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("god") && playerRights >= 1) { setAnimation(1500); playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; playerEnergy = 99999999; playerLevel[3] = 99999999; sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); sendMessage("God mode on"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("godoff") && playerRights >= 1){ sendMessage("god mode off"); playerSE = 0x328; playerSEW = 0x333; playerSER = 0x338; playerSEA = 0x326; playerEnergy = 100; playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); sendFrame126(playerEnergy +"%", 149); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } //command installed under 0087adam's help thread.

Save.
Compile.
Run.

btw, where it says

playerRights >= 1

tats for mods and admins

playerRights >= 0

Everyone

playerRights >= 2

thats for admins only

change that to them for the specified results

Subject #2

open up characters
open up the desired characters file

something likr this should appear

[code][ACCOUNT]
character-username = username
character-password = password

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3254
character-posy = 3434
character-rights = 2
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = localhost
character-lastlogin = 20070713
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 5778

[EQUIPMENT]
character-equip = 0 1163 0
character-equip = 1 6568 0
character-equip = 2 6585 0
character-equip = 3 4151 0
character-equip = 4 1127 0
character-equip = 5 1187 0
character-equip = 6 -1 0
character-equip = 7 1079 0
character-equip = 8 -1 0
character-equip = 9 7462 0
character-equip = 10 3105 0
character-equip = 11 -1 0
character-equip = 12 6735 0
character-equip = 13 -1 0

[LOOK]
character-look = 0 0
character-look = 1 7
character-look = 2 8
character-look = 3 9
character-look = 4 5
character-look = 5 0

[SKILLS]
NFS

[ITEMS]

[BANK]

[FRIENDS]

[IGNORES]

[EOF]

[/code]

Ok find

 PlayerRights = 0

change that to

Mod:

 PlayerRights = 1

Admins:

 PlayerRights = 2

there you should have it

i don’t really know what 3 is yet

save.
go back.

next go to Data

click on either administrators or Moderators depending on wat u made the player

then add his name

Save.
Compile.
Run.

SUBJECT #3

open server.java

type ctrl-f

paste this in the text box:

public static int serverlistenerPort =

then you chould see

 public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594 //43593 = Default

change the first 43594 to your port!

Save.
Compile.
Run.

Dont forget to Port Forward! XD

SUBJECT #4

Left-Click on Compile.bat
Click Edit
Delete Everything then paste this:

//All of the following code is (c) 2007 The Temple Knights http://www.freewebs.com/0087adam all rights reserved

@echo off
if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pr=%programfiles%\Java\
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title TTKScape v2.24 Compiler
echo Welcome to the TTKScape v2.2 Compiler to get started
echo Please choose an option below.
echo.
echo c - Compile yo scape.
echo r - To Run yo scape.
echo e - To exit out of TTKscape V2.2 Compiler.
echo jar - It will create your server into an executable Jar archive file.
echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this TTKscape V2.2 Compiler.
echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option: 
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==jar goto jar
if %c%==Jar goto jar
if %c%==JAR goto jar
if %c%==color goto color
if %c%==Color goto color
if %c%==COLOR goto color
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:jar
title .Jar Archive Creator
cls
echo What will be the name of the Jar Archive File??
echo.
set /p name=Name: 
if exist *.class (del *.class)
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=jar2
goto cj
:jar2
%java% -cp . *java
echo Manifest-Version: 1.0 >> manifest
echo Created-By: 1.5.0_04 (Sun Microsystems Inc.) >> manifest
echo Main-Class: server >> manifest
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\jar.exe
set go=jar3
goto cj
:jar3
if not exist *.class (goto jre)
%java% -cvfm %name%.jar manifest *.class
del runserver.bat
del manifest
del *.class
goto jl
:jar4
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=jar5
goto cj
:jar5
echo @echo off  >> runserver.bat
echo title %name% >> runserver.bat
echo %java% -cp .;%name%.jar server >> runserver.bat
echo pause >> runserver.bat
cls
echo %name% Jar file successfully made. The runserver.bat will
echo now load the Jar file. If you have any errors while runnning
echo the Jar file, In the mean time, please visit the site at:
echo http://www.freewebs.com/0087adam
pause
goto menu
set 
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option: 
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color: 
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Compiler
set pro=%pr%jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jdk1.6.0
set jav=bin\javac.exe
set go=c2
goto cj
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%java% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%java% -cp . .\src\*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
move .\src\*.class .\classes\
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You must have .java files for this Compiler to Compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
set pro=%pr%jre1.5.0
set pro2=%pr%jre1.6.0
set jav=bin\java.exe
set go=r2
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
echo please be sure you create a backup file of all your 
echo server files before you EVEN THINK ABOUT running yours
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are Valid.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cj
if exist "%pro2%_01\%jav%" (goto sj)
if exist "%pro2%\%jav%" (goto sj2)
if exist "%pro%_10\%jav%" (goto sj3)
if exist "%pro%_09\%jav%" (goto sj4)
if exist "%pro%_08\%jav%" (goto sj5)
if exist "%pro%_07\%jav%" (goto sj6)
if exist "%pro%_06\%jav%" (goto sj7)
if exist "%pro%_05\%jav%" (goto sj8)
if exist "%pro%_04\%jav%" (goto sj9)
if exist "%pro%_03\%jav%" (goto sj10)
if exist "%pro%_02\%jav%" (goto sj11)
if exist "%pro%_01\%jav%" (goto sj12)
if exist "%pro%\%jav%" (goto sj13) else (goto je)
:sj
set java="%pro2%_01\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj2
set java="%pro2%\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj3
set java="%pro%_10\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj4
set java="%pro%_09\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj5
set java="%pro%_08\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj6
set java="%pro%_07\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj7
set java="%pro%_06\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj8
set java="%pro%_05\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj9
set java="%pro%_04\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj10
set java="%pro%_03\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj11
set java="%pro%_02\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj12
set java="%pro%_01\%jav%"
goto %go%
:sj13
set java="%pro%\%jav%"
goto %go%
:je
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates.
echo please go to the java website and download it
pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler v1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto r5
:sl2
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto r6
:cl
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTkScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto c5
:cl2
cls
echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Java files were compiled using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1 >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto c4
:jl
cls
echo %name% Jar file created at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Jar file was created using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo Thank you for using TTKScape V2.2 Compiler V1>> "Compile Logs.txt"
echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt"
goto jar4
:reset
cls
echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs...
pause
del "Compile Logs.txt"
goto menu

Save.
Exit.
Compile.
run.

Read full topic
